author: jalkanen
msg: JSPWIKI-333: Now parses the system setting properly.

author: minfrin
msg: Update the RPM spec file to depend on the bzip2 binary instead of the gzip
binary. Include the formal path to the source, to match the Fedora spec file.

author: jan
msg: Use 127.0.0.1 instead of localhost to point to Futon to avoid people reporting replication test errors on systems that resolve localhost to :::1 first.
